name: Bloody Chronicles - New Cycle of Death Visual Novel
description: A serial killer is on the loose and only you can stop the Phantom! Story of Koyama Kazuki, a young detective working for the Igrasil. While working on several, seemingly unrelated cases, you find clues pointing to the person who killed your parents. Can you stop this new cycle of death before it's too late?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.8 GHz Pentium 4 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1280 x 720 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space
